mn96:6.2.pli: ‘yaṁ vā te paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, yaṁ vā te paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo;
mn96:6.2.en: ‘Who should you serve? Someone in whose service you get worse, or someone in whose service you get better?’

mn96:6.4.pli: ‘yañhi me paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, nāhaṁ taṁ paricareyyaṁ; yañca kho me paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo tamahaṁ paricareyyan’ti.
mn96:6.4.en: ‘Someone in whose service I get better.’

mn96:7.4.pli: ‘yaṁ vā te paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, yaṁ vā te paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo;
mn96:7.4.en: ‘Who should you serve? Someone in whose service you get worse, or someone in whose service you get better?’

mn96:7.6.pli: ‘yañhi me paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, nāhaṁ taṁ paricareyyaṁ; yañca kho me paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo tamahaṁ paricareyyan’ti.
mn96:7.6.en: ‘Someone in whose service I get better.’
